entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 12:43 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

Temperature: -2.2°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
